about_the_game:
Elteria Hunter

The world of Elteria is a world full of magic and monsters, and it's a dangerous world for an average human. That's why the humans created a guild full of hunters to take down these monsters and keep peace in the world. But humans are not alone in this world. There are gods and demons too. In every region there is an Elder monster who controls the region and protects it from danger. But something strange is coming and even the Elders are acting up more dangerous than normal. So are you the new hunter that can protect us for what’s coming next?



The primary focus in-game is following the story towards the stronger monsters.

And with this, you will be mainly focused on crafting and quest to fight monsters and epic bosses.

There will be a lot of different mechanics in the game to make your party very strong and make your own play style.

In the early stage, the game will not be too hard, and it makes it easy to get the hang of the game, but after the mid-story, the game will get more complex, and you will need to have good gear, or else you will die.

Buying This, you will receive the base game right now, going into early access, so the game will only grow towards his full release.

The base game includes right now (more coming with future updates :D

  • Story Quest.
  • Side Quest.
  • Dungeons.
  • Craft system.
  • Merchant system.
  • Guild System.
detailed_description:
Elteria Hunter

The world of Elteria is a world full of magic and monsters, and it's a dangerous world for an average human. That's why the humans created a guild full of hunters to take down these monsters and keep peace in the world. But humans are not alone in this world. There are gods and demons too. In every region there is an Elder monster who controls the region and protects it from danger. But something strange is coming and even the Elders are acting up more dangerous than normal. So are you the new hunter that can protect us for what’s coming next?



The primary focus in-game is following the story towards the stronger monsters.

And with this, you will be mainly focused on crafting and quest to fight monsters and epic bosses.

There will be a lot of different mechanics in the game to make your party very strong and make your own play style.

In the early stage, the game will not be too hard, and it makes it easy to get the hang of the game, but after the mid-story, the game will get more complex, and you will need to have good gear, or else you will die.

Buying This, you will receive the base game right now, going into early access, so the game will only grow towards his full release.

The base game includes right now (more coming with future updates :D

  • Story Quest.
  • Side Quest.
  • Dungeons.
  • Craft system.
  • Merchant system.
  • Guild System.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: Elteria Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: The world of Elteria is full of magic and monsters, And the Elteria Hunters are there to fight these monsters and protect the regions from evil. Level up your skill grind for equipment and become the strongest hunter!
